data.comment: The match has started at Stadio Ezio Scida.
At Stadio Ezio Scida, Spezia are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 1, Antonio Giua signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Crotone's area.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Simeon Nwankwo for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 3, Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Julian Chabot (Spezia) has received a first yellow card.
Spezia's Diego Farias has run offside.
In the minute 4, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Spezia close to the penalty box.
Goal! Crotone have got their heads in front thanks to a Junior Messias strike.
Salvatore Molina with an assist there.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Antonio Giua awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Crotone have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Spezia.
In the minute 13, Spezia's Tommaso Pobega misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Antonio Giua awards Spezia a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Crotone.
Spezia have a dangerous throw-in.
Antonio Giua signals a Spezia throw-in in Crotone's half.
In the minute 15, Crotone needs to be cautious. Spezia have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Spezia are coming forward and Kevin Agudelo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
Goal! Diego Farias levels the match at 1-1.
Simeon Nwankwo for Crotone is whistled offside.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Spezia push forward at Stadio Ezio Scida and Tommaso Pobega gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Crotone defence.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
In the minute 22, Roberto Piccoli for Spezia drives towards goal at Stadio Ezio Scida. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 22, Salva Ferrer (Spezia) has received a yellow card from Antonio Giua.
Throw-in high up the field for Crotone in Crotone.
Throw-in Spezia.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Free kick Spezia.
Free kick for Spezia in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 27, Can Spezia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Crotone Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo is caught offside.
In the minute 29, Spezia to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 32, Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Spezia are in shooting range from this free kick.
At Stadio Ezio Scida, Junior Messias has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 34, Eduardo Henrique for Crotone has been booked by Antonio Giua and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 38, Antonio Giua signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Crotone's area.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Farias gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spezia.
In the minute 42, Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Crotone in Crotone.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Crotone to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Antonio Giua blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 46, Jacopo Sala is on a sub for Salva Ferrer for Spezia.
Crotone pushes forward through Junior Messias, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 47, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Crotone capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spezia's half?
Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
In the minute 49, Arkadiusz Reca puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Salvatore Molina.
Antonio Giua awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 52, Crotone have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
In the minute 55, Free kick for Spezia in the half of Crotone.
Goal! Crotone extend their lead to 3-1 through Eduardo Henrique.
Pedro Pereira instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Spezia.
The match at Stadio Ezio Scida has been interrupted briefly for a check on Arkadiusz Reca, who is down injured.
Emmanuel Gyasi is replacing Kevin Agudelo for the away team.
In the minute 58, The away team replace Tommaso Pobega with Giulio Maggiore.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Crotone.
In the minute 60, Crotone's Arkadiusz Reca is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 63, In Crotone Spezia attack through Giulio Maggiore. The finish is off target, however.
Crotone have a goal kick.
Free kick Crotone.
In the minute 64, Giulio Maggiore is booked for the away team.
Antonio Giua awards Spezia a goal kick.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Alex Cordaz is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Alex Cordaz is back on his feet again.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Antonio Giua awards the home team a throw-in.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Spezia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 70, Crotone's Lisandro Magallan has been booked in Crotone and will miss the next match through suspension.
Antonio Giua blows against Spezia's Claudio Terzi for offside.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Giovanni Stroppa is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Ezio Scida with Giuseppe Cuomo replacing Lisandro Magallan.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 75, Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Spezia.
Spezia drive forward but Emmanuel Gyasi is judged offside.
Crotone needs to be cautious. Spezia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 77, Crotone's Salvatore Molina gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Ezio Scida. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Crotone.
Simeon Nwankwo (Crotone) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In Crotone Spezia drive forward through Nahuel Estevez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Antonio Giua signals a Crotone throw-in in Spezia's half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Antonio Giua signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Crotone's area.
Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 82, Spezia have a dangerous throw-in.
Spezia make their fourth substitution with Riccardo Marchizza replacing Simone Bastoni.
Daniele Verde is replacing Diego Farias for Spezia at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 83, Milos Vulic is on a sub for Eduardo Henrique for Crotone.
Free kick Spezia.
Spezia's Emmanuel Gyasi is whistled for offside at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 86, Junior Messias of Crotone is pulled up for offside.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Emmanuel Riviere is replacing Niccolo Zanellato for the home team.
Spezia needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Crotone.
Spezia's Daniele Verde is on target but unsuccessful.
Antonio Giua awards Spezia a goal kick.
Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Crotone Crotone drive forward through Milos Vulic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Spezia in the half of Crotone.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
In Crotone, Claudio Terzi (Spezia) misses the target with a header.
Crotone have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
The match is over. Final score 4-1.
Crotone take a comfortable 4-1 lead thanks to Junior Messias.
Great play from Simeon Nwankwo to set up the goal.
